sentences.en: Abu Nidal, a Palestinian renegade, died in Baghdad in 2002.
sentences.cn: 阿布·尼达尔是巴勒斯坦叛徒, 他于2002年在巴格达死去.

sentences.en: After all, he was Jack Quack , Renegade Drake, Prince of the Forest, King of the Lake.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 他是杰克·夸克 、 背叛者·公鸭 、 森林王子 、 湖之王啊.

sentences.en: By trying to be more relevant ─ and therefore more authentic ─ Nike has maintained a renegade edge.
sentences.cn: 藉着努力引起消费者的共鸣──如此便更添原真性──[耐吉]已保有打破常规的优势.

sentences.en: His conversation with the renegade seemed to have taken all the heart out of him.
sentences.cn: 跟那个叛徒的谈话似乎使他完全失去了勇气.

sentences.en: I was raised to a spoiled lady, a renegade.
sentences.cn: (叛徒,变节者,离经叛道者)我从小是娇生惯养的淑女, 不是离经叛道的人.

sentences.en: If you were a Renegade while alive, you may playon two living players instead of one.
sentences.cn: 如果你曾是活副警长, 你可以抓两张,然后把任意一张给其他玩家.

sentences.en: In his own way he was a renegade as Diana.
sentences.cn: 其实他是在以自己的方式背叛戴安娜,就跟戴安娜背叛查尔斯的实质一样.

sentences.en: Sir, I refuse to listen to any renegade talk!
sentences.cn: 先生, 我不想再听任何反逆的言论!

sentences.en: T he Skin Skinny When it comes to sun, Maggie is the renegade.
sentences.cn: 皮肤保养提到阳光, 玛吉的观点有点离经叛道.

sentences.en: That renegade, he won't come to a good end!
sentences.cn: 花洒的喷口好像是堵住了, 出水有些不畅.

sentences.en: The camp is administered by the NKVD, the Russian secret police, aided by renegade Germans.
sentences.cn: 战俘营由NKVD( 内政人民委员部), 也就是俄国秘密警察管理, 由变节的德国人协助.

sentences.en: The renegade is the first cousin to a rattlesnake.
sentences.cn: 叛徒象响尾蛇一样地毒狠.

sentences.en: This morning's verdict would break the renegade.
sentences.cn: 今天上午的裁决将会彻底击溃这个叛徒的阴谋.

sentences.en: When he was doing underground work he was arrested because a renegade informed against him.
sentences.cn: 他做地下工作时,曾因叛徒告密而被捕.

trans.tran_cn: 叛徒，变节者，改变信仰者
trans.tran_en: someone who leaves one side in a war, politics etc in order to join the opposing side – used to show disapproval
